programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

Academy Award Winner Kevin Spacey and young Hollywood super star Kate Boswoth star in this clever & adreniline filled heist film. An MIT math whiz is recruited by a teacher to join a specialized team of card counters.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the worlds smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: The Next Three Days
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as a family man with an ideal life who finds his world turned upside down when his wife is convicted of murdering her boss. Convinced of her innocence he decides to break her out of prison, but soon finds himself out of his depth.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: A young man assumes a false identity as a genetically perfect space navigator until a murder investigation threatens to expose his subterfuge.

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: The one girl threatening the Evil Queens reign has been training in the art of war with the very Huntsman dispatched to kill her. Evil now fights destiny.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the worlds smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: A beautiful, martial-arts-wielding genetic mutant defends her new race and a mysterious little boy.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: In the 25th century, a virus has decimated mankind. Political conflicts, though, have taken their toll. Into this setting, acrobatic assassin Aeon Flux makes a dangerous trek to take out the government's top leader.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: Financial TV host Lee Gates (George Clooney) & his producer Patty (Julia Roberts) work against the clock to unravel a conspiracy.

programme.title: Twilight

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: Bella is heartbroken when the Cullen family decide to move away in order to put a stop to her relationship with vampire Edward. She seeks comfort in friend Jacob, and starts to wonder if there could be more between them.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edwards child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: Iron Man: Rise Of Technovore
programme.desc: When a young terrorist named Ezekiel Stane attacks Starks Industries with a lethal biotechnology that threatens to destroy the world, it is up to IRON MAN to hunt down Stane and his bio-enhanced monsters known as Technovores.

programme.title: Passengers

programme.desc: A look at how food factories work, including a look at devilled egg potato salad, puff pastry cheese bites, and chocolate bars.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Defending Wild Dogs - The people going to extraordinary lengths to understand and protect canids, from preventing wild dogs dying of grief in South Africa to protecting the tiny Darwin's fox.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Joanna's explores Rajasthan, Delhi, and the mountainous North West ending in Kashmir, the place of her birth. She re-visits her modelling past by attending a photo shoot with Indian models and has a personal meeting with the Dalai Lama.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Stroll through a public park that was once a New York rail line and a church that was transformed into a thriving community hub.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brazil - Robson Green heads to exotic world locations to challenge locals at catching some of the strangest fish. In this episode he heads to Brazil.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi Ep4
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi Ep5
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - Crossing the Danakil Ep1
programme.desc: The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bahamas Exuma Cays Ep5
programme.desc: The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi Ep4
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi Ep5
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi Ep4

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi Ep5
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Child of Fire Ep2
programme.desc: For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Identity Crisis Ep5
programme.desc: Are they guinea pigs, beavers, or something else? Capybaras embody the features of several different animals at once, as do warthogs, anteaters, and other fascinating genetic hybrids. Learn why these wannabes display such particular physical traits.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Addo Elephant Ep1
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the big seven: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi Ep4
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.desc: Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.desc: The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Table Mountain Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Grass is Greener Ep2
programme.desc: Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troops invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhoods plot to kidnap Saras baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - Tropical Shores Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2013
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2013 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep17
programme.desc: Tea Times Up / Barks, Baths, And Beyond - When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition theyve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, its up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep44
programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky borrows Snips for a day to see what its like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep44
programme.desc: Lucky and the Thin Ice - The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep9
programme.desc: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti - Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesnt want the others to hear whats in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement cant happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep17
programme.desc: Tea Times Up / Barks, Baths, And Beyond - When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition theyve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, its up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep45
programme.desc: Tunnel Of Terror / Creature From The Croods Lagoon - Eep, Thunk, Lerk, and Womp set out to make it to the end of The Tunnel of Terror within the Cave of Secrets; After being rescued by a mysterious creature at the watering hole, Thunk tries to convince the Valley that a sea thing exists and it's not just his imagination

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep21
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 1 - As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep22
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 2 - The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast and the Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protg./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast and the Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protg./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep22
programme.desc: The Belly of the Weblum - Keith and Hunk embark on a plan to travel inside a Weblum to harvest Scaultrite crystals

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep48
programme.desc: Caverns And Creepers / Rad Teacher - When Eep is kicked out of Thunk's new imaginary role-playing adventure game she decides to play her own, real version of the game; Fed up with Squawk's mean teaching style, Eep has Grug fire him and replace him with Rad, the quintessential young, cool teacher

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, its up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Olivia Ep43
programme.desc: Olivia Keeps A Secret - Mother is busy planning a birthday party for Francine, and Olivia wants to help. The big surprise TV star Kicky the Kangaroo -is due to make a special appearance. But when unexpected problems confront Kicky, Olivia has to step in and save Francine's party!

programme.title: Olivia Ep44
programme.desc: Olivia Gets Fit - In preparation for their class track and field day dubbed the Hogenmuller Games after their teacher -Olivia uses a unique training regiment to help her best friend Julian be the fastest runner he can be and to give herself a jump on the competition in her own event.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep43
programme.desc: Big Chris' Big Jump - Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep44
programme.desc: Brassless Bandfinal - The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep17
programme.desc: Bad Moon Rising - After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17
programme.desc: Election - After hes rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep7
programme.desc: Moms Birthday / Angry - Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruzs help to perform a dance for Moms birthday. Though its hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep18
programme.desc: The Secret Ingredient / Delete That Dew! - When Harper is missing an ingredient to make her Moms favorite dessert on Mothers Day, Eden enlists the help of her fellow Dew Drops to do an emergency city-wide ingredient search! / When Marcus records a video of his inventions, Phoebe gets caught on camera and must erase the footage before Marcus sees, or her Dew Drop cover will be blown!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist / Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelps first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep18
programme.desc: The Secret Ingredient / Delete That Dew! - When Harper is missing an ingredient to make her Moms favorite dessert on Mothers Day, Eden enlists the help of her fellow Dew Drops to do an emergency city-wide ingredient search! / When Marcus records a video of his inventions, Phoebe gets caught on camera and must erase the footage before Marcus sees, or her Dew Drop cover will be blown!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep45
programme.desc: The Good Book - Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep46
programme.desc: The King And Mrs. Mort - When King Julien gets sick, Mort must attend the Best Kingdom of Madagascar Award ceremony and comes back to find a Queen has taken his place

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep18
programme.desc: The Secret Ingredient / Delete That Dew! - When Harper is missing an ingredient to make her Moms favorite dessert on Mothers Day, Eden enlists the help of her fellow Dew Drops to do an emergency city-wide ingredient search! / When Marcus records a video of his inventions, Phoebe gets caught on camera and must erase the footage before Marcus sees, or her Dew Drop cover will be blown!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep46
programme.desc: Voice Fail Part 1 & 2 - When Grug wakes up without a voice, he and Ugga go on the hunt to find his voice, while Eep, Thunk, and Gran stay behind. But when the Valleyites come to Eep with questions for Grug, she takes this opportunity to be a leader by pretending to have a conversation with Grug in their cave

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep47
programme.desc: Punch Thunk Love / Nay Boors - When Eep and the others try to intervene with Thunk and Blurg's first date, they decide to run away so they can live happily ever after; Snoot and Ugga race each other to get to the Doomsday Skunkguin but are forced to put their differences aside once the weirder animals come out to hunt them down

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep119
programme.desc: New Shoes - Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep120
programme.desc: The School Fete - Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while they're there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Mummy Pig's Birthday - It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza / Bread - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1017
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Stop the Mighty Queen / Mighty Pups Stop the Hiccups - The Mighty Pups must stop Sweetie from using her new powers to take over Adventure Bay. // Mighty Nano gets the hiccups and starts duplicating out of control, it's up to Liberty and the Mighty Pups to find a cure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1016
programme.desc: Mighty Pups vs. The Big Chill / Mighty Pups vs. The Mighty Cheetah - Harold creates a ray that can freeze things instantly, it goes awry and sends a giant ice ball toward Adventure Bay. // When the Cheetah snatches half of Chase's Crystal, Chase must stop the Cheetah and restore his crystal before anyone gets hurt.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep615
programme.desc: Mighty Pups: Pups Save a Giant Chicken - The Ladybird is back and Chickaletta has super powers! The Mighty Twins join the Mighty Pups to save a Giant Chicken and the town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Little Axolotl / Bubble Trouble - Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep220
programme.desc: The Freeze Out / The Crystal Coral Conundrum - Instead of confronting his pals about a problem, Chucks decides to find a new friend group. // When the Crystal Coral Tree goes missing, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson are on the case.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride / Swimming Solo - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony. // Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Treasure Hunt - Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Not Very Well - Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes / S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Barbazoo's Diary / The Great Reporter - Barbazoo have plenty of things to write about in his diary! // After reading the biography of Nellie Bly, Barbalib is determined to become a Great Reporter!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Private Club / Green Algae - Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. // Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Truck Rangers - Blaze and his friends have joined the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments. But when Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone in a heap of trouble, Blaze must race to the rescue!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Trouble at the Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1017
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Stop the Mighty Queen / Mighty Pups Stop the Hiccups - The Mighty Pups must stop Sweetie from using her new powers to take over Adventure Bay. // Mighty Nano gets the hiccups and starts duplicating out of control, it's up to Liberty and the Mighty Pups to find a cure.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep226
programme.desc: Saltwater Studios / Sand Crabby - When Baby and his friends are asked to perform at a music festival, they can't decide which genre of song to play. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson solve a crabby mystery.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Present - Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep305
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Paddingtron/Paddington's First Diwali - Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. // Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant, but will they both get to enjoy the fireworks finale?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift - Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Cattle Drive - When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starlas barn.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Penguin Panic / Cave Conundrum - When an iceberg boat turns up on the shore, the city and forest are suddenly overrun with problematic penguins! // When the Deer Squad get separated in the crystal caves, they must think and act like each other to get out safely.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1017
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Stop the Mighty Queen / Mighty Pups Stop the Hiccups - The Mighty Pups must stop Sweetie from using her new powers to take over Adventure Bay. // Mighty Nano gets the hiccups and starts duplicating out of control, it's up to Liberty and the Mighty Pups to find a cure.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album. // Dora and Boots help a baby parrot named Lorito find his Mami, but he can't stop copying Boots!

programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Disappearing - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Hero Squad / Paddinton's Knightly Quest - Paddington, Jonathan and Judy gain super powers from a superfood cake, but are they real heroes? // Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight; but he just needs to complete three heroic quests in a day!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep815

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep819

programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Invasion / Prank Day - Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. // Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire - The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Dragon Island Duel - It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a race around tropical Dragon Island! But when Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must set out to rescue his best friend and bring him back to the starting line.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Runaway Rocket - When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now its up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep815
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Quest for the Dragon's Tooth - When Ryder and the pups are knighted by the Princess of Barkingburg, they're put to the test when a disgruntled ex-Knight gains control of a dragon and attacks the castle.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Shark Strength - When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut - Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Sneezing Cold - Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call, Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles! Our heroes must race back to Axle City to bring the sick trucks the medicine oil they need.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Adventure Camp / Colour Drain - Adventure Alex is holding an adventure camp but the Twins are super competitive and want to win ALL the badges. // Kai invents a gardening gnome to help Jade plant flowers but it malfunctions and drains colours from the forest.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Hero Squad / Paddinton's Knightly Quest - Paddington, Jonathan and Judy gain super powers from a superfood cake, but are they real heroes? // Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight; but he just needs to complete three heroic quests in a day!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album. // Dora and Boots help a baby parrot named Lorito find his Mami, but he can't stop copying Boots!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep222
programme.desc: Findependence Day / Costello Quits - Fishy Force takes on a villain who steals all the treats in Carnivore Cove. // When Costello quits, Vigo sets out to be a supervillain without his henchfishy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Fishy Force / Superhero Training Day - Vola, Goldie, Chucks, and Hank feel left out when they learn that Baby and William have been keeping a super secret. // To prepare for their first big TV interview, Fishy Force trains to be just like their favorite comic book heroes.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: The Incredible Journey of the Volkswagen Golf - The VW Golf: one of the most successful cars of all time. The brainchild of star Italian designer Giorgetto Giugiaro, the Golf and its faster GTi version have won a cult following among its passionate fans around the world. But while once deemed revolutionary, Golfs today are often seen as a symbol of mediocrity. We trace the amazing journey of the Golf and look forward to what lies ahead for it.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: The Incredible Journey of the Volkswagen Golf - The VW Golf: one of the most successful cars of all time. The brainchild of star Italian designer Giorgetto Giugiaro, the Golf and its faster GTi version have won a cult following among its passionate fans around the world. But while once deemed revolutionary, Golfs today are often seen as a symbol of mediocrity. We trace the amazing journey of the Golf and look forward to what lies ahead for it.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Bad Blood - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS - Bend it like Dybala.. and 9 other wicked efforts that make up Serie As top 10 curlers from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill
programme.desc: Over 30 years in the making, UFC celebrates its 300th numbered event with 3 title fights and a stacked card. Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep15
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Prosecco DOC UK Round
programme.desc: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Prosecco DOC UK Round - Back to where it all began for WorldSBK, the famous Donington Park circuit has hosted countless classics in its time as a World Superbike venue. From 1988, the circuit has hosted 52 races and made memories each year for a variety of reasons. Set in the gorgeous Leicestershire countryside, the circuit twists and turns through the scenery, to the soundtrack of thousands of cheering fans, year-in, year-out.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Round 5: Red Sparks vs Hillstate
programme.desc: Round 5: Red Sparks vs Hillstate - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lemos vs. Jandiroba
programme.desc: Prelims - A women's strawweight bout between former UFC Women's Strawweight Championship challenger Amanda Lemos and former Invicta FC Strawweight Champion Virna Jandiroba is expected to headline the event.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lemos vs. Jandiroba
programme.desc: Main Event - A women's strawweight bout between former UFC Women's Strawweight Championship challenger Amanda Lemos and former Invicta FC Strawweight Champion Virna Jandiroba is expected to headline the event.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Champs Only - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.desc: U Pick Promotion - Rent now on U Pick from only RM10 exclusively on Unifi TV. Also available on Unifi TV App.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Namajunas vs. Cortez
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC lands at the Ball Arena in Denver, Colorado this weekend with two exciting women's flyweight contenders as former UFC strawweight champion Rose Namajunas puts her #6 ranking on the line against up and coming #11 Tracy Cortez. In the co-main event, the "Argentine Dagger" Santiago Ponzinibbio goes mano-a-mano with "The King of Kung Fu" Muslim Salikhov at welterweight.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Namajunas vs. Cortez
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC lands at the Ball Arena in Denver, Colorado this weekend with two exciting women's flyweight contenders as former UFC strawweight champion Rose Namajunas puts her #6 ranking on the line against up and coming #11 Tracy Cortez. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo.
